name: SymbolTable
desc: Symbol table management for the Balbismo compiler.

name: SymbolTable
desc: Manages symbols (variables and functions) within a scope during compilation.

name: canSet
desc: Validates that a variable assignment is type-safe and the variable exists.

name: clear
desc: Clears all variables from the current scope.

name: create
desc: Declares a new variable in the current scope.

name: createChild
desc: Creates a new child symbol table for nested scope management.

name: createFunction
desc: Registers a function definition in the global function table.

name: get
desc: Retrieves a variable definition by name, searching through scope hierarchy.

name: getFunction
desc: Retrieves a function definition by name from the global function table.

name: remove
desc: Removes a variable from the current scope.

name: strings
desc: Global storage for string constants to enable deduplication.

name: main
desc: Balbismo Compiler - Main entry point and compilation orchestration

name: CompileModes
desc: Enumeration of available compilation modes for the Balbismo compiler.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: invalidMode
desc: Handles invalid compilation mode by displaying error and usage information.

name: main
desc: Main entry point for the Balbismo compiler.

name: printUsage
desc: Displays comprehensive usage information for the Balbismo compiler.

name: node
desc: Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) node definitions and LLVM IR generation for Balbismo.

name: ArgumentList
desc: Represents a list of function call arguments in Balbismo.

name: ArgumentList.new
desc: Constructs an argument list from argument expression nodes.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: ArraySpecification
desc: Represents an array size specification in Balbismo.

name: ArraySpecification.new
desc: Constructs an array size specification with an optional size expression.

name: childExpr
desc: Gets the size expression from the children, or null if no expression provided.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates the array size expression if present.

name: ArrayTypeNode
desc: Represents an array type specification in Balbismo.

name: ArrayTypeNode.new
desc: Constructs an array type node with a primitive type and size specification.

name: size
desc: Gets the array size specification from the children.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: nodeValue
desc: The primary value associated with this node (varies by node type).

name: BinOp
desc: Represents a mathematical binary operation in Balbismo.

name: BinOp.new
desc: Constructs a binary mathematical operation with the operator and operands.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: BlockNode
desc: Represents a block of statements in Balbismo.

name: BlockNode.new
desc: Constructs a block node with the given child statements.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates all child nodes in order within a new scope.

name: BoolBinOp
desc: Represents a boolean binary operation in Balbismo.

name: BoolBinOp.new
desc: Constructs a boolean binary operation with the operator and operands.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: BoolOperator
desc: Enumeration of boolean operators for logical expressions in Balbismo.

name: fromString
desc: Converts a string operator representation to the corresponding enum value.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: BoolUnOp
desc: Represents a boolean unary operation in Balbismo.

name: BoolUnOp.new
desc: Constructs a boolean unary operation with the operator and operand.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: FloatVal
desc: Represents a floating-point literal value in Balbismo.

name: FloatVal.new
desc: Constructs a floating-point value node by parsing the string representation.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: FuncCall
desc: Represents a function call expression in Balbismo.

name: FuncCall.new
desc: Constructs a function call with the function name and arguments.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: FuncDec
desc: Represents a function declaration in Balbismo.

name: FuncDec.new
desc: Constructs a function declaration with all its components.

name: block
desc: Gets the function body block.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates the function declaration by generating the complete LLVM function definition.

name: identifier
desc: Gets the function name identifier.

name: params
desc: Gets the list of function parameters.

name: returnType
desc: Gets the function's return type.

name: FunctionList
desc: Represents a collection of function declarations in Balbismo.

name: FunctionList.new
desc: Constructs a function list from function declaration nodes.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates all function declarations in the list.

name: funcs
desc: Gets the list of function declarations.

name: IdentifierNode
desc: Represents a variable identifier reference in Balbismo.

name: IdentifierNode.new
desc: Constructs an identifier node with the variable name.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates the identifier by looking up and loading the variable's value.

name: IfNode
desc: Represents an if-then-else conditional statement in Balbismo.

name: IfNode.new
desc: Constructs an if statement with condition, then-block, and optional else-block.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: IndexedIdentifierNode
desc: Represents an array element access using indexing in Balbismo.

name: IndexedIdentifierNode.new
desc: Constructs an indexed identifier with an array name and index expression.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates the array element access by computing the element address and loading its value.

name: index
desc: Gets the index expression used to access the array element.

name: IntVal
desc: Represents an integer literal value in Balbismo.

name: IntVal.new
desc: Constructs an integer value node by parsing the string representation.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates the integer literal by generating LLVM IR to create the constant value.

name: MathOp
desc: Enumeration of mathematical operators supported in Balbismo expressions.

name: fromString
desc: Converts a string operator representation to the corresponding enum value.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Node
desc: Abstract base class for all AST nodes in the Balbismo compiler.

name: Node.new
desc: Constructs a new AST node with the given value and children.

name: addConstantString
desc: Adds a string constant to the LLVM IR and returns its global name.

name: addHeaderIrLine
desc: Adds a line to the LLVM IR header section.

name: addIrLine
desc: Adds a line to the LLVM IR with current indentation.

name: addIrlLabel
desc: Adds a labeled block to the LLVM IR and increases indentation.

name: children
desc: Child nodes that form the structure of this node.

name: endIrLabel
desc: Ends a labeled block by decreasing indentation.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: i
desc: Global counter for generating unique node IDs.

name: id
desc: Unique identifier for this node, used for LLVM register naming.

name: ir
desc: Global LLVM IR code accumulator.

name: irIndent
desc: Current indentation level for LLVM IR formatting.

name: newId
desc: Generates a new unique ID for node identification.

name: nodeValue
desc: The primary value associated with this node (varies by node type).

name: strCount
desc: Global counter for generating unique string constant names.

name: ParameterList
desc: Represents a list of function parameters in Balbismo.

name: ParameterList.new
desc: Constructs a parameter list from declaration nodes.

name: params
desc: Gets the list of parameter declarations.

name: PrintNode
desc: Represents a printf statement for output in Balbismo.

name: PrintNode.new
desc: Constructs a print statement with format string and values.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: RelOp
desc: Represents a relational comparison operation in Balbismo.

desc: Constructs a relational operation with the operator and operands.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: RelOperator
desc: Enumeration of relational operators for comparison expressions in Balbismo.

name: fromString
desc: Converts a string operator representation to the corresponding enum value.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

desc: Constructs a return statement with an optional return value.

desc: Evaluates the return statement by generating a ret instruction.

desc: Gets the return value expression.

desc: Represents a scanf statement for input in Balbismo.

name: ScanfNode.new
desc: Constructs a scanf statement with format string and target variables.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: StringLiteral
desc: Represents a string literal constant in Balbismo.

name: StringLiteral.new
desc: Constructs a string literal with the string content.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: TypeCast
desc: Represents a type cast operation in Balbismo.

name: TypeCast.new
desc: Constructs a type cast operation with target type and source expression.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: TypeNode
desc: Represents a type specification in Balbismo.

name: TypeNode.new
desc: Constructs a type node with the specified language type.

name: UnOp
desc: Represents a mathematical unary operation in Balbismo.

name: UnOp.new
desc: Constructs a unary mathematical operation with the operator and operand.

name: evaluate
desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: WhileNode
desc: Represents a while loop statement in Balbismo.

desc: Constructs a while loop with condition and body block.

desc: Evaluates this AST node and generates corresponding LLVM IR code.

name: generateLLVMConstant
desc: Generates an LLVM constant string definition from a Dart string.

name: vars
desc: Core type system definitions for the Balbismo programming language.

name: ArrayType
desc: Represents an array type in Balbismo.

name: ArrayType.new
desc: Constructs an array type for the specified primitive element type.

name: irType
desc: Returns the LLVM IR type representation for this array type.

name: LangFunc
desc: Represents a function definition in the Balbismo language.

name: LangFunc.new
desc: Constructs a language function with the specified name and declaration.

name: funcDec
desc: The AST declaration node containing the function's implementation details.

name: name
desc: The name of the function.

name: LangType
desc: Abstract base class for all language types in Balbismo.

name: LangType.new
desc: Constructs a language type with the specified primitive type.

name: irType
desc: Returns the LLVM IR type representation for this language type.

name: primitiveType
desc: The underlying primitive type that forms the basis of this language type.

name: props
desc: Equatable implementation for proper type comparison.

name: toString
desc: Returns the LLVM IR type string representation of this language type.

name: LangVal
desc: Represents a value in the Balbismo language with its type information.

name: LangVal.new
desc: Constructs a language value with the specified register name and type.

name: regName
desc: The LLVM register name where this value is stored.

name: type
desc: The type of this value.

name: LangVar
desc: Represents a variable in the Balbismo language with its type and memory location.

name: LangVar.new
desc: Constructs a language variable with the specified pointer name and type.

name: ptrName
desc: The LLVM pointer name where this variable is allocated in memory.

name: type
desc: The type of this variable.

name: PrimitiveType
desc: Represents a primitive language type in Balbismo.

name: PrimitiveType.new
desc: Constructs a primitive type from a PrimitiveTypes enum value.

name: PrimitiveTypes
desc: Enumeration of primitive types supported by the Balbismo language.

name: fromString
desc: Converts a string representation to the corresponding primitive type.

name: irType
desc: Returns the LLVM IR type representation for this primitive type.

name: toString
desc: Returns the LLVM IR type string representation of this primitive type.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: yamlParser
desc: Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) parsing utilities for the Balbismo compiler.

name: parseAstFile
desc: Parses an AST file from YAML format into a concrete AST node structure.

name: parseNode
desc: Recursively parses a YAML node representation into a concrete AST node.
